The HCI EPO plan offers a monthly premium of $300, making it more accessible for users in this income bracket. Additionally, the plan has a deductible of $2500 and a maximum out-of-pocket expense (Max OOP) of $6500, further reducing the financial burden on the user when accessing healthcare services.

In summary, given the user's medical history, current data, income, and employment, the HCI EPO plan provides the most appropriate balance of coverage and affordability to meet their needs effectively.
